channel.title: Please help [Delta]
channel.description: How would i make it, So when an Owner/admin/mod logs in or out, it says " Owner Example has logged in/out"? will Repp+

item.title: Please help [Delta]

if (playerRights == 3){ yell("Owner " + playerName + " has logged in."); }
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Name Here")) { yell("Owner " + playerName + " has logged in."); }

item.title: Please help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“JGX, post:3, topic:413576”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=515076.msg3739702#msg3739702 date=1315252357]
How would i make it, So when an Owner/admin/mod logs in or out, it says " Owner Example has logged in/out"? will Repp+
[/quote]

I have this for my server. OleanPkz. Check it out in my signature!

Search:

public void Welcomessage() {

Under you will find something like this:

if (playerRights == 0)
{

sM("Welcome to the OleanPkz community located in Varrock!");
yell("Regular Player, " + playerName + " has just logged on.");

}

Just copy what I had…the “yell line”

[quote]
yell(“Regular Player, " + playerName + " has just logged on.”);[/quote]

Rep++ please:)[/quote]
where do i search this

public void Welcomessage() {

item.title: Please help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

pot up pls:

How would i make it, So when an Owner/admin/mod logs in or out, it says " Owner Example has logged in/out"? will Repp+

I have this for my server. OleanPkz. Check it out in my signature!

Search:

public void Welcomessage() {

Under you will find something like this:

if (playerRights == 0) { 
sM("Welcome to the OleanPkz community located in Varrock!");
yell("Regular Player, " + playerName + " has just logged on.");

}

Just copy what I had…the “yell line”

yell("Regular Player, " + playerName + " has just logged on.");

Rep++ please:)
